column4: hey ther can any1 please help me i will b gr8ful i have attached my Billionton Bluetooth Device in USB Port but in ubuntu Bluetooth is disabled how to enable it please help!
how to enable Bluetooth in ubuntu?
is your bluetooth turned on/plugged in?
do you have it built in into a laptop?
is there a little switch to turn bluetooth on/off? probably close to the wifi switch...
mine works out of the box. What does lsusb say?
What's happening? the terminal is *not* scary...
ah, you have a terminal open.
have you run lsusb yet?
this is an example: http://paste.ubuntu.com/308475/
we need that info to help you.
what exactly is the problem...
we *need* the lsusb info to help you. We can't smell the problem from up here...
thanks
you have exactly tha same dongle as I have. Are you using ubuntu 9.04 or 9.10?
have you ever used the bluetooth dongle on a older version of ubuntu?
Can you help me?
i'm here and i'm trying to find out what happened
I have very less time left i have to go in few minutes what do i do?
come back later and ask again :D
what timezone are you in?
